name: Rahmeen Habib
bio: I write C++ at the university, have 10 week professional experience with Java in an intern project and am an RGSoC scholar for a JavaScript Project

name: Rin Raeuber
bio: My grandma taught me BASIC, but I never learnt to whistle. – Originally a Ruby coder, I only recently learnt the ins and outs and this’ and thats of Javascript myself. Lost and overwhelmed? Been there and happy to help.

name: Julia Gao
bio: I am a front-end developer who has been using vanilla JavaScript for the past three years. I would love to help others on this track.

name: Sophie Doiron
bio: I am a CS/Physics university student.  My favorite CS related topic is AI.  I've been programming with JavaScript off and on for about 7 years now and I'm excited to help others with the language!

name: Rafael Galdencio
bio: I work as a fullstack dev in a major company in Brazil. With over 18 years in the area, I'm still passionate about learning. And now I'm heading to the next step: teaching.
